S06sspp2_1u:14: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:15_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pṛthivīdhātvasattāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:15_1: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:15_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā pṛthivīdhātvasattānyā pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatānyā pṛthivīdhātuviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:15_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasattā yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:15_5: yā ca pṛthivīdhātuviviktatā yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:15_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:16: abdhātvasattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abdhātuśūnyatayā pūrvāntano bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:27: abdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:28_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābdhātvasattāyām abdhātuśūnyatāyām abdhātuviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:28_1: abdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:28_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābdhātvasattā
S06sspp2_1u:28_4: yā cābdhātuśūnyatā yā cābdhātuviviktatā yā cābdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:28_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:40: tejodhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:41_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tejodhātvasattāyāṃ tejodhātuśūnyatāyāṃ tejodhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:41_1: tejodhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:41_2: na cānyā tejodhātvasattānyā tejodhātuśūnyatānyā tejodhātuviviktatānyā tejodhātvasvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:41_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:41_4: yā ca tejodhātvasattā yā ca tejodhātuśūnyatā yā ca tejodhātuviviktatā yā ca tejodhātvasvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:41_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:54: vāyudhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:55_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vāyudhātvasattāyāṃ vāyudhātuśūnyatāyāṃ vāyudhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:55_1: vāyudhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:55_2: na cānyā vāyudhātvasattānyā vāyudhātuśūnyatānyā vāyudhātuviviktatānyā vāyudhātvasvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:55_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:55_4: yā ca vāyudhātvasattā yā ca vāyudhātuśūnyatā yā ca vāyudhātuviviktatā yā ca vāyudhātvasvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:55_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:67: ākāśadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:68_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśadhātvasattāyām ākāśadhātuśūnyatāyām ākāśadhātuviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:68_1: ākāśadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:68_2: na cānyā ākāśadhātvasattānyā ākāśadhātuśūnyatānyā ākāśadhātuviviktatānyā ākāśadhātvasvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:68_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:68_4: yā cākāśadhātvasattā yā cākāśadhātuśūnyatā yā cākāśadhātuviviktatā yā cākāśadhātvasvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:68_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:81: vijñānadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:82_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānadhātvasattāyāṃ vijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ vijñānadhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:82_1: vijñānadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:82_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā vijñānadhātvasattānyā vijñānadhātuśūnyatānyā vijñānadhātuviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:82_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca vijñānadhātvasattā yā ca vijñānadhātuśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:82_5: yā ca vijñānadhātuviviktatā yā ca vijñānadhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:82_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:94: avidyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:95_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāvidyāsattāyām avidyāśūnyatāyām avidyāviviktatāyām avidyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:95_1: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyāvidyāasattānyāvidyāśūnyatānyāvidyāviviktatānyāvidyāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:95_2: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra

S06sspp2_1u:95_4: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac (ŚsP_II-1_5)
S06sspp2_1u:96: ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:108: saṃskārāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:109_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃskārāsattāyāṃ saṃskāraśūnyatāyāṃ saṃskāraviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:109_1: saṃskārāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:109_2: na cānyā saṃskārāsattānyā saṃskāraśūnyatānyā saṃskāraviviktatānyā saṃskārāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:109_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:109_4: yā ca saṃskārāsattā yā ca saṃskāraśūnyatā yā ca saṃskāraviviktatā yā ca saṃskārāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:109_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:121: vijñānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:122_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānāsattāyāṃ ca vijñānaśūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:122_1: vijñānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:122_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:122_4: yā ca vijñānāsattā yā ca vijñānaśūnyatā yā ca vijñānaviviktatā yā ca vijñānāsvabhāvatā (ŚsP_II-1_6)
S06sspp2_1u:123: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:135: nāmarūpāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:136_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmarūpāsattāyāṃ nāmarūpaśūnyatāyāṃ nāmarūpaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:136_1: nāmarūpāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:136_2: na cānyā nāmarūpāsattānyā nāmarūpaśūnyatānyā nāmarūpaviviktatānyā nāmarūpāsvabhāvatānyo

S06sspp2_1u:136_4: yā ca nāmarūpasattā yā ca nāmarūpaśūnyatā yā ca nāmarūpaviviktatā yā ca nāmarūpāsvabhāvatā

S06sspp2_1u:148: ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:149_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra ṣaḍāyatanāsattāyāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatāyāṃ ṣaḍāyatanaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:149_1: ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:149_2: na cānyā ṣaḍāyatanāsattānyā ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatānyā ṣaḍāyatanaviviktatānyā ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:150_0: pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca ṣaḍāyatanāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:150_1: yā ca ṣaḍāyatanaśūnyatā yā ca ṣaḍāyatanaviviktatā yā ca ṣaḍāyatanāsvabhāvatā yaś
S06sspp2_1u:150_2: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:162: sparśāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:163_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sparśāsattāyāṃ ca sparśaśūnyatāyāṃ sparśaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:163_1: sparśāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:163_4: yā ca sparśaśūnyatā yā ca sparśaviviktatā yā ca sparśāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:163_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:176_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vedanāsattāyāṃ ca vedanāśūnyatāyāṃ vedanāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:176_1: vedanāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:176_2: na cānyā vedanāsattānyā vedanāśūnyatānyā vedanāviviktatānyā vedanāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ (ŚsP_II-1_8)
S06sspp2_1u:177_0: pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca vedanāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:177_1: yā ca vedanāśūnyatā yā ca vedanāviviktatā yā ca vedanāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:177_2: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:189: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:190_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tṛṣṇāsattāyāṃ ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:190_1: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:190_2: na cānyā tṛṣṇāsattānyā tṛṣṇāśūnyatānyā tṛṣṇāviviktatānyā tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:190_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca tṛṣṇāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:190_4: yā ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatā yā ca tṛṣṇāviviktatā yā ca tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:190_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:202: upādānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:203_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputropādānāsattāyām upādānaśūnyatāyām upādānaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:203_1: upādānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:203_2: na cānyā upādānāsattānyā upādānaśūnyatānyā upādānaviviktatānyā upādānāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:204_0: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā copādānāsattā yā copādānaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:204_1: yā copādānaviviktatā yā copādānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś
S06sspp2_1u:204_2: cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:216: bhavāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:217_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhavāsattāyāṃ ca bhavaśūnyatāyāṃ bhavaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:217_1: bhavāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:217_2: na cānyā bhavāsattānyā bhavaśūnyatānyā bhavaviviktatānyā bhavāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:217_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca bhavāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:217_4: yā ca bhavaśūnyatā yā ca bhavaviviktatā yā ca bhavāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:217_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:229: jātyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:230_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jātyasattāyāṃ ca jātiśūnyatāyāṃ jātiviviktatāyāṃ jātyasvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:230_1: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā jātyasattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:231_0: āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca jātyasattā yā ca jātiśūnyatā yā ca jātiviviktatā yā
S06sspp2_1u:231_1: ca jātyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:243: jarāmaraṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:244_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jarāmaraṇāasattāyāṃ ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:244_1: jarāmaraṇasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:244_2: na cānyā jarāmaraṇāsattānyā jarāmaraṇaśūnyatānyā jarāmaraṇaviviktatānyā jarāmaraṇāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:244_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:244_4: yā ca jarāmaraṇāsattā yā ca jarāmaraṇaśūnyatā yā ca jarāmaraṇaviviktatā yā ca jarāmaraṇāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:244_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:256: dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:257: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitāsattāyāṃ dānapāramitāśūnyatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_11)
S06sspp2_1u:258_1: upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā dānapāramitāsattānyā dānapāramitāśūnyatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:258_3: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dānapāramitāsattā yā
S06sspp2_1u:258_4: ca dānapāramitāśūnyatā yā ca dānapāramitāviviktatā yā ca dānapāramitāsvabhāvatā yaś
S06sspp2_1u:258_5: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:270: śīlapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:520_2: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:520_3: yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāsattā yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:520_4: yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:520_5: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:528: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvaśūnyatāsattayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:531: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:532_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:532_1: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:532_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:532_4: yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:532_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:542: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:543_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra svabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:543_1: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:543_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:543_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:543_5: yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:543_6: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:554: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:556_2: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:556_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:556_4: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:556_5: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:569: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:570_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:570_1: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:570_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā smṛtyupasthānāsattānyā smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatānyā smṛtyupasthānaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:570_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā yā ca smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:570_5: yā ca smṛtyupasthānaviviktatā yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:570_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:582: samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:583: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samyakprahāṇāsattāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaśūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaviviktatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_26)
S06sspp2_1u:584_0: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā samyakprahāṇāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:584_2: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samyakprahāṇāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:584_3: yā ca samyakprahāṇaśūnyatā yā ca samyakprahāṇaviviktatā yā ca samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:584_4: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:591: ṛddhipādaviviktatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:595: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:596_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrarddhipādāsattāyām ṛddhipādaśūnyatāyām ṛddhipādaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:596_1: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:596_2: na cānyā ṛddhipādāsattānyā ṛddhipādaśūnyatānyā ṛddhipādaviviktatānyā ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:596_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:596_4: yā carddhipādāsattā yā carddhipādaśūnyatā yā carddhipādaviviktatā yā carddhipādāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:596_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:609: madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:610_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrendriyāsattāyām indriyaśūnyatāyām indriyaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:610_1: indriyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:610_2: na cānyā indriyāsattānyā indriyaśūnyatānyā indriyaviviktatānyā indriyāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:610_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:610_4: yā cendriyāsattā yā cendriyaśūnyatā yā cendriyaviviktatā yā cendriyāsvabhāvatā yaś
S06sspp2_1u:610_5: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:622: balāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:623_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra balāsattāyāṃ balaśūnyatāyāṃ balaviviktatāyāṃ balāsvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:623_1: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā balāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:623_3: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca balāsattā yā ca balaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:623_4: yā ca balaviviktatā yā ca balāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:623_5: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:637_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhyaṅgāsattāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaśūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:637_1: bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:637_2: na cānyā bodhyaṅgāsattānyā bodhyaṅgaśūnyatānyā bodhyaṅgaviviktatānyā bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:637_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:637_4: yā ca bodhyaṅgāsattā yā ca bodhyaṅgaśūnyatā yā ca bodhyaṅgaviviktatā yā ca bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:637_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:649: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:650_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattāyām āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:650_1: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:650_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatānyā āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:650_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattā yā cāryaṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:650_5: yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaviviktatā yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:650_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:662: āryasatyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:663_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāryasatyāsattāyām āryasatyaśūnyatāyām āryasatyaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:663_1: āryasatyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:663_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:663_4: yā cāryasatyāsattā yā cāryasatyaśūnyatā yā cāryasatyaviviktatā yā cāryasatyāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:663_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:675: dhyānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:676_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānāsattāyāṃ dhyānaśūnyatāyāṃ dhyānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:676_1: dhyānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:676_2: na cānyā dhyānāsattānyā dhyānaśūnyatānyā dhyānaviviktatānyā dhyānāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:676_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dhyānāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:676_4: yā ca dhyānaśūnyatā yā ca dhyānaviviktatā yā ca dhyānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:676_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:689: apramāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:690_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāpramāṇāsattāyām apramāṇaśūnyatāyām apramāṇaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:690_1: apramāṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:690_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāpramāṇāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:690_4: yā cāpramāṇaśūnyatā yā cāpramāṇaviviktatā yā cāpramāṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:690_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:702: ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:703_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrārūpyasamāpattyasattāyām ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatāyām ārūpyasamāpatti
S06sspp2_1u:703_1: viviktatāyām ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:703_2: na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā ārūpyasamāpattyasattānyā ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:703_4: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cārūpyasamāpattyasattā
S06sspp2_1u:704: yā cārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:706: vimokṣaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. vimokṣaviviktatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:715: vimokṣāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:716_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vimokṣāsattāyāṃ vimokṣaśūnyatāyāṃ vimokṣaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:716_1: vimokṣāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:716_2: na cānyā vimokṣāsattānyā vimokṣaśūnyatānyā vimokṣaviviktatānyā vimokṣāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:716_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:716_4: yā ca vimokṣāsattā yā ca vimokṣaśūnyatā yā ca vimokṣaviviktatā yā ca vimokṣāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:716_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:728: anupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:730_1: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:730_2: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasattā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:730_3: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:730_4: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:742: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:743_2: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:743_5: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:743_6: yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaśūnyatā yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaviviktatā yā ca (ŚsP_II-1_33)
S06sspp2_1u:744: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:756: abhijñāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:757_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhijñāsattāyām abhijñāśūnyatāyām abhijñāviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:757_1: abhijñāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:757_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābhijñāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:757_4: yā cābhijñāśūnyatā yā cābhijñāviviktatā yā cābhijñāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:757_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:769: samādhyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:770_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samādhyasattāyāṃ samādhiśūnyatāyāṃ samādhiviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:770_1: samādhyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:770_2: na cānyā samādhyasattānyā samādhiśūnyatānyā samādhiviviktatānyā samādhyasvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:771_0: 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samādhyasattā yā ca samādhiśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:771_1: yā ca samādhiviviktatā yā ca samādhyasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto
S06sspp2_1u:771_2: yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:783: dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:784_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhāraṇīmukhāsattāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:784_1: dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:784_2: na cānyā dhāraṇīmukhāsattānyā dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānyā dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatānyā dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:784_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:784_4: yā ca dhāraṇīmukhāsattā yā ca dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatā yā ca dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatā yā
S06sspp2_1u:784_5: ca dhāraṇīmukhāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca
S06sspp2_1u:796: tathāgatabalāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:798_1: tathāgatabalāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:798_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā tathāgatabalāsattānyā tathāgatabalaśūnyatānyā tathāgatabalaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:798_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca tathāgatabalāsattā yā ca tathāgatabalaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:798_5: yā ca tathāgatabalaviviktatā yā ca tathāgatabalāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:798_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:810: vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:811_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vaiśāradyāsattāyāṃ vaiśāradyaśūnyatāyāṃ vaiśāradyaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:811_1: vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:811_2: na cānyā vaiśāradyāsattānyā vaiśāradyaśūnyatānyā vaiśāradyaviviktatānyā vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:811_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:811_4: yā ca vaiśāradyāsattā yā ca vaiśāradyaśūnyatā yā ca vaiśāradyaviviktatā yā ca vaiśāradyāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:811_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:824: pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:825_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratisaṃvidasattāyāṃ pratisaṃvidśūnyatāyāṃ pratisaṃvidviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:825_1: pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:825_2: na cānyā pratisaṃvidasattānyā pratisaṃvidśūnyatānyā pratisaṃvidviviktatānyā pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:825_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:825_4: yā ca pratisaṃvidasattā yā ca pratisaṃvidśūnyatā yā ca pratisaṃvidviviktatā yā ca
S06sspp2_1u:825_5: pratisaṃvidasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:837: mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:838_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra mahākaruṇāsattāyāṃ mahākaruṇāśūnyatāyāṃ mahākaruṇāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:838_1: mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:838_2: na cānyā mahākaruṇāsattānyā mahākaruṇāśūnyatānyā mahākaruṇāviviktatānyā mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:838_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:838_4: yā ca mahākaruṇāsattā yā ca mahākaruṇāśūnyatā yā ca mahākaruṇāviviktatā yā ca mahākaruṇāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:838_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:839: āveṇikabuddhadharmāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. āveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:849: āveṇikabuddhadharmāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:850_2: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattānyāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatānyāveṇikabuddhadharmaviviktatānyāveṇikabuddhadharmāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:850_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:850_4: yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmaviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:850_5: yā cāveṇikabuddhadharmāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:850_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:851: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dharmadhātvasattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:862: dharmadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:863_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dharmadhātvasattāyāṃ dharmadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:863_1: dharmadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
S06sspp2_1u:863_2: na cānyā dharmadhātvasattānyā dharmadhātvśūnyatānyā dharmadhātuviviktānyā dharmadhātvasvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:864_0: 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dharmadhātvasattā
S06sspp2_1u:864_1: ya ca dharmadhātuśūnyatā yā ca dharmadhātuviviktatā yā ca dharmadhātvasvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:864_2: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:865: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathatāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:876: tathatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:877_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathatāsattāyāṃ tathatāśūnyatāyāṃ tathatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:877_1: tathatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
S06sspp2_1u:877_2: na cānyā tathatāsattānyā tathatāśūnyatānyā tathatāviviktānyā tathatāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:877_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:877_4: yā ca tathatāsattā yā ca tathatāśūnyatā yā ca tathatāviviktatā yā ca tathatāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:877_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:878: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bhūtakoṭyasattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:889: bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:891_1: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate. na cānyā bhūtakoṭyasattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:891_3: pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca bhūtakoṭyasattā
S06sspp2_1u:891_4: yā ca bhūtakoṭiśūnyatā yā ca bhūtakoṭiviviktatā yā ca bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatā yaś ca
S06sspp2_1u:891_5: bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:892: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrācintyadhātvasattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:903: acintyadhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:904_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrācintyadhātvasattāyām acintyadhātuśūnyatāyām acintyadhātuviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:904_1: acintyadhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:904_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:904_4: yā cācintyadhātvasattā yā cācintyadhātuśūnyatā yā cācintyadhātuviviktatā yā cācintyadhātv
S06sspp2_1u:904_5: asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam
S06sspp2_1u:905: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śrāvakāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:917: śrāvakāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:918_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ śrāvakaśūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:918_1: śrāvakāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
S06sspp2_1u:918_2: na cānyā śrāvakāsattānyā śrāvakaśūnyatānyā śrāvakaviviktānyā śrāvakāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:918_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:918_4: yā ca śrāvakāsattā yā ca śrāvakaśūnyatā yā ca śrāvakaviviktatā yā ca śrāvakāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:918_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:919: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratyekabuddhāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:930: pratyekabuddhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:931_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratyekabuddhāsattāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaśūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:931_1: pratyekabuddhāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:931_2: upalabyate. na cānyā pratyekabuddhāsattānyā pratyekabuddhaśūnyatānyā pratyekabuddhaviviktānyā
S06sspp2_1u:931_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca pratyekabuddhāsattā yā ca pratyekabuddhaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:931_5: yā ca pratyekabuddhaviviktatā yā ca pratyekabuddhāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:931_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:933: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:944: bodhisattvāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:945_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvāsattāyāṃ bodhisattvaśūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:945_1: bodhisattvāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
S06sspp2_1u:945_2: na cānyā bodhisattvāsattānyā bodhisattvaśūnyatānyā bodhisattvaviviktānyā bodhisattvāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:945_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:945_4: yā ca bodhisattvāsattā yā ca bodhisattvaśūnyatā yā ca bodhisattvaviviktatā yā ca
S06sspp2_1u:945_5: bodhisattvāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:946: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvajñāsattayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:957: sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:958_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvajñāsattāyāṃ sarvajñaśūnyatāyāṃ sarvajñaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:958_1: sarvajñāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabyate.
S06sspp2_1u:958_2: na cānyā sarvajñāsattānyā sarvajñaśūnyatānyā sarvajñaviviktānyā sarvajñāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:959_0: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca sarvajñāsattā yā ca sarvajñaśūnyatā yā ca sarvajñaviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:959_1: yā ca sarvajñāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca
S06sspp2_1u:960: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:964: kena kāraṇena rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:965_0: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:965_1: na madhyam upalabhyate. anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti nāma vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣmañ
S06sspp2_1u:965_2: chāradvatīputra na rūpasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:965_3: upalabhyate rūpaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ
S06sspp2_1u:967: kena kāraṇena vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. vedanā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:968: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:970_0: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:970_1: na madhyam upalabhyate vedanāśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:970_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:973: saṃjñā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:974: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:976: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃjñāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃjñāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:977: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa (ŚsP_II-1_43)
S06sspp2_1u:981: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:982: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:984: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃskārāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃskāraśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:985: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:988: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:989: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:991: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate vijñānaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:992: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:995: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:996: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:998: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣo na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate cakṣurśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:999: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa cakṣuṣo 'paryantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1002: śrotram āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1003: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1005: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na śrotrasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate śrotraśūnyatām (ŚsP_II-1_44)
S06sspp2_1u:1006: upādāya, na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa śrotrāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1009: ghrāṇam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:1284: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa tejodhātvaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.

S06sspp2_1u:1360: vedanā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:1440: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:1443: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra (ŚsP_II-1_58)

S06sspp2_1u:1773: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇāveṇikabuddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1774: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:1775: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1776: kena kāraṇena vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1777: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1778: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1779: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1780: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1781: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1782: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1783: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1784: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃjñā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1785: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1786: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1787: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1788: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1789: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:1791: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1792: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1793: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1794: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1795: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1796: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1797: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1798: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrādhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1799: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1800: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1801: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1802: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1803: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1804: śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1805: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1806: mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1807: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1808: paramārthaśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1809: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1810: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1811: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1813: na hi śūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1815: na hi śūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1817: na hi śūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1819: na hi śūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1820: prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1821: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1824: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1825: svalakṣanaśūnyatā svalakṣanaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1826: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣanaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1828: na hi śūnyatāyām anupalambhaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1830: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1831: bhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1832: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1834: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1835: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1836: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1837: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1838: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1839: na hi śūnyatāyām indriyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1840: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ balāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1841: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1842: na hi śūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1843: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ āryasatyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1844: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1845: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ apramāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1846: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. aṣṭau vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1847: na hi śūnyatāyām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1848: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na (ŚsP_II-1_72)
S06sspp2_1u:1849: bodhisattvaḥ. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣa mukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1850: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1851: na hi śūnyatāyām abhijñāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1852: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samādhayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1853: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatabalāni tathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1854: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgatabalāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1855: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vaiśāradyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1856: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1857: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahākaruṇā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1858: na hi śūnyatāyām āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1859: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathatā tathatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1860: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1861: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. acintyadhātur acintyadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1862: na hi śūnyatāyām acintyadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1863: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1864: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mārgākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1865: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1866: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1867: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1868: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ buddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ. tat (ŚsP_II-1_73)
S06sspp2_1u:1870: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1871: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatas tathāgatena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1872: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgataḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1873: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1874: vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1875: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1876: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1877: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:1878: yad apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evam āha kena kāraṇena vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:1879: evam āha sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalambhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ vadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S06sspp2_1u:1880: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1893: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1897: cakṣuḥ śrotraś ca ghrāṇe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1930: cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānañ ca ghrāṇavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1947: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1950: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1953: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1981: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuś ca tejodhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1983: tejodhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātāv abdhātau ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1984: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1987: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1990: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1998: avidyā saṃskārāś ca vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2000: vijñānam avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2033: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2036: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2039: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2043: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2053: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2056: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2059: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2105: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2107: ṛddhipādāḥ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2125: āryasatyāni dhyānāni cāpramāṇeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2127: apramāṇāny āryasatyeṣu dhyāneṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2154: tathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni ca pratisaṃvitsu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2165: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāś ca srotaāpattidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2168: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭakadharmāḥ srotaāpattidharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2171: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhattvadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2174: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2177: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2185: pṛthagjanabhūmir gotrabhūmiś cāṣṭamakabhūmau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2214: sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2221: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī cānāgāmini na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2223: anāgāmī srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmini ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2243: avavādānuśāsanī bodhisattvaprajñāpāramitayor na saṃvidyate nopa labhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:2244: evam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhamāneṣu bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:2245: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta punar bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2247: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2248: tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2249: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2250: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2251: yac ca nāmadheyamātrañ ca na tad rūpaṃ na sā vedanā na sā saṃjñā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2252: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2253: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣur iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihveti kāya iti mana iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2254: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2255: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣur na śrotraṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ na sā jihvā na sa kāyo na tan manaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2256: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2257: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti śabda iti gandha iti rasa iti sparśa iti dharmā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2258: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2259: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tad rūpaṃ na sa śabdo na gandho na sa raso na sa sparśo na te dharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2260: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2261: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣurvijñām iti śrotravijñānam iti ghrāṇavijñānam iti jihvāvijñānam iti kāyavijñānam iti manovijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2262: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2263: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ na tan manovijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2264: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2265: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa iti śrotrasaṃsparśa iti ghrāṇasaṃsparśa iti jihvāsaṃsparśa (ŚsP_II-1_92)
S06sspp2_1u:2267: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2268: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2269: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2270_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
S06sspp2_1u:2271: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2272_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:2272_1: na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:2272_2: na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2273: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmaṃ tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2274: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta pṛthivīdhātur ity abdhātur iti tejodhātur iti vāyudhātur ity ākāśadhātur iti vijñānadhātur iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2275: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2276: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa pṛthivīdhātur na so 'bdhātur na sa tejodhātur na sa vāyudhātur na sa ākāśadhātur na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2277: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2278_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāvidyeti saṃskārā
S06sspp2_1u:2278_1: iti vijñānam iti nāmarūpam iti ṣaḍāyatanam iti sparśam iti vedaneti tṛṣṇety upādānam
S06sspp2_1u:2278_2: iti bhava iti jātir iti jarāmaraṇam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2279: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2280_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sāvidyā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:2280_1: na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sa sparśo na sā vedanā na sā tṛṣṇā na tad upādānaṃ na sa bhavo
S06sspp2_1u:2280_2: na sā jātir na taj jarāmaraṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2281: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ na nāma svabhāvena (ŚsP_II-1_93)
S06sspp2_1u:2282: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2283: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā na ca nāmni dānapāramitā na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2284: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2285: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2286: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā na ca nāmni śīlapāramitā na ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2287: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śīlapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2288: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2289: nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta kṣāntipāramitā na ca nāmni kṣāntipāramitā na ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2290: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca kṣāntipāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2291: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2292: namadheyamātram etad yad uta vīryapāramitā na ca nāmni vīryapāramitā na ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2293: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca vīryapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2294: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2295: namadheyamātram etad yad uta dhyānapāramitā na ca nāmni dhyānapāramitā na ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2296: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dhyānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2297: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2298: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2299: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2300: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2301: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2302: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2303: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2304: namadheyamātram etad yad uta bahirdhāśūnyatā na ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_94)
S06sspp2_1u:2305: nāma na ca nāmni bahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2306: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2307: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2308: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2309: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2310: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2311: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śūnyatāśūnyatā na ca śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni śūnyatāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2312: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2313: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2314: namadheyamātram etad yad uta mahāśūnyatā na ca mahāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2315: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mahāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2316: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2317: namadheyamātram etad yad uta paramārthaśūnyatā na ca paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni paramārthaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2318: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2319: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2320: namadheyamātram etad yad uta saṃskṛtaśūnyatā na ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni saṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2321: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2322: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2323: namadheyamātram etad yad utāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā na cāsaṃskṛtasunyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2324: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cāsaṃskṛtaśunyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2325: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2326: namadheyamātram etad yad utātyantaśūnyatā na cātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny atyantaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2327: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cātyantaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2328: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2329: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utānavarāgraśūnyatā na cānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavarāgraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā (ŚsP_II-1_95)
S06sspp2_1u:2330: hi yac ca nāma yā cānavarāgraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2331: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2332: namadheyamātram etad yad utānavakāraśūnyatā na cānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavakāraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2333: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānavakāraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2334: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2335: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prakṛtiśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2336: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2337: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2338: namadheyamātram etad yad uta sarvadharmaśūnyatā na ca sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvadharmaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2339: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2340: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2341: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2342: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2343: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2344: namadheyamātram etad yad utānupalambhaśūnyatā na cānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anupalambhaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2345: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānupalambhaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2346: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2347: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvaśūnyatā na cābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2348: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2349: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2350: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatā na ca svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2351: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2352: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2353: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cabhavasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2354: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na (ŚsP_II-1_96)
S06sspp2_1u:2356: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2357: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2358: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta smṛtyupasthānānīti na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2359: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2360: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2361: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samyakprahāṇānīti na ca samyakprahāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni samyakprahāṇāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2362: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca samyakprahāṇāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2363: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2364: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utarddhipādā iti na carddhipādeṣu nāma na ca nāmny ṛddhipādāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2365: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye carddhipādā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:4395: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. abhijñā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4399: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. dhāraṇīmukhāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni,
