S06sspp2_1u:4407: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. mahāmaitry anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:4411: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4415: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpam anabhinirvṛttaṃ vedanānabhinirvṛttā saṃjñānabhinirvṛttā saṃskārā anabhinirvṛttā vijñānam anabhinirvṛttam.
S06sspp2_1u:4417: kena kāraṇenāyuṣmañ subhūte yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4421: yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad vijñānam iti vadasi?
S06sspp2_1u:4422: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4423: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4424: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4425: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃjñā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4426_0: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā
S06sspp2_1u:4426_1: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:4426_2: prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4427: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4428: cakṣuḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4429: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotraṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4430: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4431: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4432: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4433: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manaḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4434: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4435: rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4436: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śabdaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4438: na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. gandhaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4439: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. rasaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4440: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. sparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4441: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4442: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4443: cakṣurvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4444: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotravijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4445: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇavijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4446: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4447: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyavijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4448: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manovijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4449: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4450: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4451: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4452: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4453: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4454: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyasaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4455: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4456: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4457: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4458: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ (ŚsP_II-1_151)
S06sspp2_1u:4459: prajñāyate. śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4460: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4461: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4462: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4463: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4464: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4465: pṛthivīdhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4466: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. abdhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4467: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. tejodhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4468: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vāyudhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4469: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ākāśadhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4470: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vijñānadhātuḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4471: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4472: avidyā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4473: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4474: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4475: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. nāmarūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4476: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ṣaḍāyatanaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4477: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. sparśaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4478: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ (ŚsP_II-1_152)
S06sspp2_1u:4479: prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4480: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. tṛṣṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4481: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. upādānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4482: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bhavaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4483: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jātiḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4484: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. jarāmaraṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4485: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4486: dānapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4487: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śīlapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4488: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. kṣāntipāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4489: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. vīryapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4490: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānapāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4491: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. prajñāpāramitā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4492: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4493: adhyātmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4494: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. bahirdhāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4495: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4496: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4497: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ, (ŚsP_II-1_153)
S06sspp2_1u:4498: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. paramārthaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4499: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. saṃskṛtaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4500: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4501: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. atyantaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4502: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anavarāgraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4503: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anavakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4504: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4505: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. sarvadharmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4506: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4507: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthity anyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. anupalambhaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4508: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4509: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. svabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4510: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4511: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4512: smṛtyupasthānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4513: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samyakprahāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4514: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ṛddhipādā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4515: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. indriyāṇi prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ, yeṣāṃ (ŚsP_II-1_154)
S06sspp2_1u:4516: notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. balāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4517: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bodhyaṅgāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4518: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4519: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryasatyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4520: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4521: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. apramāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4522: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4523: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4524: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4525: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4526: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhijñā prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4527: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samādhayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4528: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhāraṇīmukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4529: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. daśatathāgatabalāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4530: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catvāri vaiśāradyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4531: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4532: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāmaitrī prakṛtiśūnyā (ŚsP_II-1_155)
S06sspp2_1u:4533: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4534: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. mahākaruṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4535: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4536: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4537: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4617: ye 'nabhisaṃskṛtā na te ṛddhipādāḥ yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_1u:4634: yā anabhisaṃskṛtā na tāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4643: tat kim anabhinirvṛttaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
S06sspp2_1u:4644_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yānabhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_1u:4644_1: sānābhinirvṛttir iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cābhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4646: tat kim anabhinirvṛttiṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06sspp2_1u:4648_0: kena kāraṇena nānyatrābhivṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti. tathā
S06sspp2_1u:4648_1: hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyam
S06sspp2_1u:4648_2: anabhinirvṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati. iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś
S06sspp2_1u:4650: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vedanā samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4651: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃjñāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4652: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃjñā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4653: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4654: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4656: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatranabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotraṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4658: cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4659: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4660: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4661: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ manaḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4662: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4664: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śabdaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4665: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śabdaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā gandhaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4666: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca gandhaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rasaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4667: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rasaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4668: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā dharmān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4669: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4671: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4672: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotravṇñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4674: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāvijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4675: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyavyñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4676: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv o advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manovijñānaṃ samanunpaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4677: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manovijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4679: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam (ŚsP_II-1_159)
S06sspp2_1u:4681: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4682: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4683: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4684: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4685: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4687: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4688: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4689: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4690: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4691: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4692: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4694: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca pṛthivīdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abdhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4695: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tejodhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4696: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tejodhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vāyudhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4697: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vāyudhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkārm. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ākāśadhātuṃ (ŚsP_II-1_160)
S06sspp2_1u:4699: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ākāśadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4700: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4702: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāvidyā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4703: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4704: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter nāmarūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4705: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca nāmarūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4706: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4707: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4708: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tṛṣṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4709: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tṛṣṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter upādānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4710: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca upādānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bhavaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4711: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bhavaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter jātiṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4712: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jātiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter jarāmaraṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4713: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jarāmaraṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4715: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dānapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter śīlapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4716: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śīlapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter kṣāntipāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4717: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kṣāntipāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vīryapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4718: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vīryapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. (ŚsP_II-1_161)
S06sspp2_1u:4720: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhyānapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4721: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4723: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4724: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4725: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4726: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śūnyatāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4727: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ paramārthaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4728: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca paramārthaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4729: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4730: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter atyantaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4731: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cātyantaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4732: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānavarāgraśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anavakāraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4733: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānavakāraśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4734: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prakṛtiśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4735: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4736: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anupalambhaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati, (ŚsP_II-1_162)
S06sspp2_1u:4737: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānupalambhaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4738: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4739: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca svabhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4740: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4742: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca smṛtyupasthānāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samyakprahāṇāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4743: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samyakprahāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ṛddhipādān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4744: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṛddhipādāṃś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter indriyāṇi samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4745: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cendriyāṇi cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter balāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4746: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca balāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bodhyaṅgāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4747: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhyaṅgāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4748: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter āryasatyāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4749: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāryasatyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhyānāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4750: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhyānāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter apramāṇāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4751: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4752: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cārūpyasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4753: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭau vimokṣāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4754: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ (ŚsP_II-1_163)
S06sspp2_1u:4756: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhijñāḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4757: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhijñāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samādhīn samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4758: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samādhayaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4759: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhāraṇīmukhāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter daśatathāgatabalāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4760: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca daśatathāgatabalāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catvāri vaiśāradyāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4761: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4762: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāmaitrīṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4763: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāmaitrī cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahākaruṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4764: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahākaruṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4765: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4766: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mārgākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4767: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mārgākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4768: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4769: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
S06sspp2_1u:4770: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivam āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:4771_0: sacet bodhisatto mahāsattva evam uddiśyamānenotrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
S06sspp2_1u:4771_1: āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:4772_0: nirīhakāt sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. svapnopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:4772_1: māyopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. mārīcyupamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:4772_2: pratiśrutkopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratibhāsopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:4773: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06sspp2_1u:4775: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_1u:4776: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4777: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4778: tasmin samaye saṃjñāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃjñeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4779: tasmin samaye saṃskārān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskārā ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4780: tasmin samaye vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vijñānam etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4781: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣur etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4782: tasmin samaye śrotraṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotram etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4783: tasmin samaye ghrāṇaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4784: tasmin samaye jihvāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihveyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4785: tasmin samaye kāyaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4786: tasmin samaye mano nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mana etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4787: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4788: tasmin samaye śabdaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śabdo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4789: tasmin samaye gandhaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati gandho 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4790: tasmin samaye rasaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati (ŚsP_II-1_165)
S06sspp2_1u:4792: tasmin samaye sparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sparśao 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4793: tasmin samaye dharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dharmā ima iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4794: tasmin samaye cakṣurvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣurvijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4795: tasmin samaye śrotravijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotravijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4796: tasmin samaye ghrāṇavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajftāpayati ghrāṇavijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4797: tasmin samaye jihvāvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāvijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4798: tasmin samaye kāyavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyavijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4799: tasmin samaye manovijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manovijñānam etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4800: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4801: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4802: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4803: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4804: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4805: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4806: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4807: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4808: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4809: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4811: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4812: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4813: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_1u:4814: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dānapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4815: tasmin samaye śīlapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śīlapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4816: tasmin samaye kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kṣāntipāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4817: tasmin samaye vīryapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vīryapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4818: tasmin samaye dhyānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dhyānapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4819: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4820: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4821: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati bahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4822: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4823: tasmin samaye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śūnyatāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4824: tasmin samaye mahāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mahāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4825: tasmin samaye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati paramārthaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4826: tasmin samaye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4827: tasmin samaye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty asaṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4828: tasmin samaye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty atyantaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4829: tasmin samaye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavarāgraśūnyateyam (ŚsP_II-1_167)
S06sspp2_1u:4830: iti, tasmin samaye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavakāraśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4831: tasmin samaye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prakṛtiśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4832: tasmin samaye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sarvadharmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4833: tasmin samaye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svalakṣaṇaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4834: tasmin samaye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anupalambhaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4835: tasmin samaye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4836: tasmin samaye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svabhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4837: tasmin samaye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4838: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtyupasthānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4839: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samyakprahāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4840: tasmin samaye ṛddhipādān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati ṛddhipādā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4841: tasmin samaye indriyāṇi nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayatīndriyāṇy etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4842: tasmin samaye balāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati balānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4843: tasmin samaye bodhyaṅgāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati bodhyaṅgānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4844: tasmin samaye āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryāṣṭaṅgo mārga iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4845: tasmin samaye āryasatyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryasatyāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4846: tasmin samaye dhyānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhyānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4847: tasmin samaye 'pramāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty apramāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4848: tasmin samaye ārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty ārūpyasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4849: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭau vimokṣān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty aṣṭau vimokṣā (ŚsP_II-1_168)
S06sspp2_1u:4850: ima iti, tasmin samaye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4851: tasmin samaye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4852: tasmin samaye 'bhijñā nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty abhijñā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4853: tasmin samaye samādhīn nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhaya ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4854: tasmin samaye dhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhāraṇīmukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4855: tasmin samaye daśatathāgatabalāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati daśatathāgatabalānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4856: tasmin samaye catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catvāri vaiśāradyānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4857: tasmin samaye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catasraḥ pratisaṃvida imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4858: tasmin samaye mahāmaitrīṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahāmaitrīyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4859: tasmin samaye mahākaruṇāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahākaruṇeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4860: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āveṇikā buddhadharmā eta iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4861_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06sspp2_1u:4861_1: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati sarvasamadhidhāraṇīmukhāṇy etānīti.
S06sspp2_1u:4863: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4967: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:4969: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4970: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4971: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4972: tathā hi bhagavan yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4973: iti hi vedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4974: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4975: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4976: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:4977: iti hi saṃjñā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4978: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4979: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:4980: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārā,
S06sspp2_1u:4981: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4982: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4983: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4984: tathā hi bhagavan yo vijñānasyānutpādo na te vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4985: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4986: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4987: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ.
S06sspp2_1u:4988: tathā hi yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4990: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4991: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4992: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4993: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:4994: iti hi śrotraṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4995: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4996: tasmād yah śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4997: tathā hi bhagavan ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:4998: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4999: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5000: tasmād yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5001: tathā hi bhagavan jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5002: iti hi jihvā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5003: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5004: tasmād yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5005: tathā hi yo bhagavan kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5006: iti hi kāyaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5007: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5008: tasmād yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5009: tathā hi yo bhagavan manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5010: iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5011: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5012: tasmād yo manaso nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5013: yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5014: iti hi rūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5015: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5016: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5017: yo bhagavan śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5018: iti hi śabdaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5019: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5020: tasmād yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5021: yo bhagavan gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5022: iti hi gandhaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5023: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5024: tasmād yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5026: yo bhagavan rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5027: iti hi rasaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5028: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5029: tasmād yo rasasyānutpādo na so rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5030: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśa,
S06sspp2_1u:5031: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5032: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5033: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5034: yo bhagavan dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5035: iti hi dharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5036: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5037: tasmād yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5038: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5039: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5040: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5041: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5042: yo bhagavan śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5043: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5044: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5045: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5046: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5047: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5048: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5049: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5050: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5051: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5052: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5053: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5054: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5055: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5056: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5057: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5058: yo bhagavan manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5059: iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5060: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_173)
S06sspp2_1u:5062: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5063: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5064: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5065: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5066: yo bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5067: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5068: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5069: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5070: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5071: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5072: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5073: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5074: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na tan jihvāsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5075: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5076: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5077: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5078: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5079: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5080: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5081: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5082: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5083: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5084: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5085: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5086: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5087: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5088: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5089: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5090: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5091: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5093: eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5094: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5095: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5096: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5097: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5098: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5099: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5100: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5101: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5102: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5103: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5104: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5105: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5106: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5107: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5108: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5109: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5110: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5111: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5112: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5113: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5114: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5115: yo bhagavan abdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5116: iti hy abdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5117: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5119: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5123: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5124: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5125: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5126: iti hi vāyudhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5127: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5128: tasmād yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5129: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5130: iti hy ākāśadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5131: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5132: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5133: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5134: iti hi vijñānadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5135: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5136: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5137: yo bhagavann avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_1u:5138: iti hy avidyā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5139: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5141: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5142: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5144: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5145: tasmād yo saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5146: yo bhagavan vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5147: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5148: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5149: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5150: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5151: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5152: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5153: tasmād yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5154: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
S06sspp2_1u:5155: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5156: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_176)
S06sspp2_1u:5158: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5159: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5160: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5161: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5162: yo bhagavan vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5163: iti hi vedanāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5164: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5165: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5166: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5167: iti hi tṛṣṇāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5168: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5169: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5170: yo bhagavan upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5171: iti hy upādānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5172: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5173: tasmād ya upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5174: yo bhagavan bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5175: iti hi bhavaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5176: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5177: tasmād yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5178: yo bhagavan jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5179: iti hi jātiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5180: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5181: tasmād yo jātier anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5182: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:5183: iti hi jarāmaraṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5184: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5185: tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5186: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5187: iti hi dānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5188: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5189: tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5190: yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5191: iti hi śīlapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? (ŚsP_II-1_177)
S06sspp2_1u:5192: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5193: tasmād yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5194: yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5195: iti hi kṣāntipāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5196: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5197: tasmād yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5198: yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5199: iti hi vīryapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5200: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5201: tasmād yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5202: yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5203: iti hi dhyānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5204: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5205: tasmād yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5206: yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5207: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5208: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5209: tasmād yo prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajnāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5210: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5211: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5212: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5214: yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5215: iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5216: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5217: tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5218: yo bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5219: iti hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5220: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5222: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5223: iti hi śūnyatāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5224: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, tasmād (ŚsP_II-1_178)
S06sspp2_1u:5225: yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5226: yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5227: iti hi mahāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5228: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5229: tasmād yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5230: yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5231: iti hi paramārthaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5232: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5233: tasmād yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5234: yo bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5235: iti hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5236: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5237: tasmād yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5238: yo bhagavan asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5239: iti hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5240: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5242: yo bhagavan atyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5243: iti hy atyantaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5244: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5246: yo bhagavan anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5247: iti hy anavarāgraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5248: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5250: yo bhagavan anavakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5251: iti hy anavakāraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5252: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5254: yo bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5255: iti hi prakṛtiśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5256: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5257: tasmād yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5258: yo bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā, (ŚsP_II-1_179)
S06sspp2_1u:5259: iti hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5260: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5261: tasmād yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5262: yo bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5263: iti hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5264: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5265: tasmād yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5266: yo bhagavan anupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5267: iti hy anupalambhaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5268: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5270: yo bhagavan abhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5271: iti hy abhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5272: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5274: yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5275: iti hi svabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5276: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5277: tasmād yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5278: yo bhagavan abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5279: iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5280: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5282: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānānīti hi smṛtyupasthānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5283: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5284: tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5285: yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇānīti hi samyakprahāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5286: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5287: tasmād yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5289: yo bhagavann ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādā iti hy ṛddhipādāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5290: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5291: tasmād y a ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5292: yo bhagavann indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇīti hīndriyāṇi cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5293: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5294: tasmād ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_1u:5295: yo bhagavan balānām anutpādo na tāni balānīti hi balāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5296: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5297: tasmād yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5298: yo bhagavan bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgānīti hi bodhyaṅgāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5299: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5300: tasmād yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5301: yo bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti hy āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5302: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5303: tasmād ya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5304: yo bhagavann āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyānīti hi āryasatyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5305: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5306: tasmād y a āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5307: yo bhagavan dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānānīti hi dhyānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5308: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5309: tasmād yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5310: yo bhagavann apramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇānīti hy apramāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5311: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5312: tasmād yo 'pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5313: yo bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattaya iti hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. (ŚsP_II-1_181)
S06sspp2_1u:5315: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5316: tasmād ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5317: yo bhagavan vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣā iti hi vimokṣāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5318: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5319: tasmād yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5320: yo bhagavann anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5321: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5322: tasmād yo nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5323_0: yo bhagavann śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti
S06sspp2_1u:5323_1: hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
