S06sspp2_1u:5325: tasmād yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5326: yo bhagavann abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñā iti hy abhijñāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5327: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5328: tasmād yo 'bhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5329: yo bhagavan samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhaya iti hy samādhayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5330: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5331: tasmād yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5332: yo bhagavann dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5333: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5334: tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāny dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5335: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5336: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5337: tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5339: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5340: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5341: tasmād yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:5342: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5343: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5344: tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5345: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sa mahāmaitrī iti hi mahāmaitrī cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5346: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5347: tasmād yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_1u:5348: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5349: iti hi mahākaruṇā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5350: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5351: tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5352: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5353: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5354: tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5355: yo bhagavan tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5356: iti hi tathatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5357: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5358: tasmād yaḥ tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5359: yo bhagavan dharmatāyā anutpādo na tā dharmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5360: iti hi dharmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5361: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5362: tasmād yo dharmatāyā anutpādo na sā dharmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5363: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5364: iti hi dharmadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5365: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5366: tasmād yo dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5367: yo bhagavan dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na sa dharmaniyāmatā, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_183)
S06sspp2_1u:5368: dharmaniyāmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5369: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5370: tasmād yo dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na ta dharmaniyāmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5371: yo bhagavan bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭir iti hi bhūtakoṭiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5372: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5373: tasmād yo bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5374: yo bhagavann acintyadhātor anutpādo na so 'cintyahātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5375: iti hy acintyadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5376: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5378: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5379: iti hi sarvajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5381: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5382: tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5383: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5384: iti hi mārgākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5385: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5386: tasmād yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5387: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5388: iti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5389: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5390: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_1u:5391: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5392: iti hi rūpañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5393: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5394: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5395: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5396: iti hi vedanā ca vyayas cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5397: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5398: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5399: yo bhagavan saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:5400: iti hi saṃjñā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5402: vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5403: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:5404: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5405: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5406: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5407: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārānāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5408: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5409: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5410: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5411: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:5412: yo bhagavan cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5413: iti hi cakṣuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5414: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5415: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5416: yo bhagavan chrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:5417: iti hi śrotraṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5418: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5419: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5420: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:5421: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5422: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5423: tasmād yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5424: yo bhagavan jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5425: iti hi jihvā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5426: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5427: tasmād yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5428: yo bhagavan kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5429: iti hi kāyaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5430: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5431: tasmād yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5432: yo bhagavan manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5433: iti hi manaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5434: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5435: tasmād yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5437: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam iti hi rūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5438: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5439: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5440: yo bhagavan śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5441: iti hi śabdaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5442: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5443: tasmād yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5444: yo bhagavan gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5445: iti hi gandhaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5446: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5447: tasmād yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5448: yo bhagavan rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5449: iti hi rasaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5450: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5451: tasmād yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5452: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5453: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5454: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5455: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5456: yo bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5457: iti hi dharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5459: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5460: tasmād yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5461: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5462: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5463: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5464: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5465: yo bhagavan chrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5466: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5467: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5468: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5469: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5470: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ? (ŚsP_II-1_186)
S06sspp2_1u:5471: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5472: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5473: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5474: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5475: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5476: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5477: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5478: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5479: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5480: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5481: yo bhagavan manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5482: iti hi manovijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5483: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5484: tasmād yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:5485: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5486: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5487: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5488: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5489: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5490: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5491: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5492: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśassya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5493: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5494: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5495: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5496: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5497: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5498: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5499: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5500: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5501: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5502: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5503: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5504: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5506: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5507: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5508: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5509: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5510: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5511: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5512: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5513: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5514: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5515: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5516: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5517: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5518: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5519: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5520: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5521: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5522: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5523: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5524: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5525: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5526: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5527: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5528: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5529: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5530: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5531: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5532: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5533: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_1u:5535: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5536: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5537: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5538: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5539: yo bhagavann abdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5540: iti hy abdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5541: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5543: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5544: iti hi tejodhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5546: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5547: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5548: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5549: iti hi vāyudhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5550: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5551: tasmād yo vāyudhātor vyayo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5552: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa akāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5553: iti hy ākāśadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5554: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5555: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5556: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5557: iti hi vijñānadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5558: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5559: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5560: yo bhagavann avidyāyā vyayo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_1u:5561: iti hy avidyā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5562: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5564: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5565: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5566: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5567: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5568: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5569: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5571: na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5572: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5573: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5574: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5575: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5576: tasmād yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5577: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
S06sspp2_1u:5578: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5579: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5580: tasmād yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5581: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5582: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5583: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5584: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5585: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5586: iti hi vedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5587: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5588: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5589: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5590: iti hi tṛṣṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5591: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5592: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5593: yo bhagavan upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5594: iti hy upādānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5595: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5596: tasmād ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5597: yo bhagavan bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5598: iti hi bhavaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5599: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5600: tasmād yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5601: yo bhagavan jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5602: iti hi jātiś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5603: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5604: tasmād yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5605: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_190)
S06sspp2_1u:5606: jarāmaraṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5607: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5608: tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_1u:5609: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5610: iti hi dānapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5612: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5613: tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5614: yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5615: iti hi śīlapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5616: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5617: tasmād yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5618: yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5619: iti hi kṣāntipāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5620: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5621: tasmād yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vyayo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5622: yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5623: iti hi vīryapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5624: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5625: tasmād yo vīryapāramitāyā vyayo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5626: yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5627: iti hi dhyānapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5628: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5629: tasmād yo dhyānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5630: yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5631: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5632: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5633: tasmād yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_1u:5634: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5635: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5636: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5638: yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5639: iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5640: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, (ŚsP_II-1_191)
S06sspp2_1u:5641: tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5642: yo bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5643: iti hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5644: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5646: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5647: iti hi śūnyatāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5648: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5649: tasmād yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5650: yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5651: iti hi mahāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5652: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5653: tasmād yo mahāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5654: yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
